title: 怎么在spigot端生成一个实体
author: yxiaobai
txt_content: 如题，还有生成后怎么传送这个实体？？我看了下doc结果没找到。。是要用nms吗真的看过doc了。。

replies.author: ImagineBreaker
replies.txt_content:
810587921 发表于 2017-4-7 03:47
https://hub.spigotmc.org/javadocs/bukkit/org/bukkit/World.html
spawnEntity(Location loc, EntityType  ...
_(:з」∠)_能不能问下锅炉端的生成实体是什么,没spawnEntity这个方法啊

replies.author: 4one_R
replies.txt_content:
World world = Bukkit.getWorld(name);
Entity e = world.spawnEntity(arguments...)
